page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Work undertaken in this study has been a joint effort by the children of{Barwell Junior School}and students of{John Cleveland College.} The younger children concerned themselves with a detailed amenity count which extended far beyond the requirements of this survey.They also included some creative work. The older students from the College devised a detailed questionnaire which was presented to 36 people in the area. Comments on the resulting analysis are included under the 'Survey' headings. A detailed geographical study was also produced.
